alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 10 at 8:18PM CDT until September 10 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BEAVER...SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS...NORTHWESTERN LIPSCOMB... NORTHEASTERN HANSFORD AND OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hardesty to 5 miles south of Balko to 5 miles northeast of Elmwood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 810 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 70 mph wind gust in Beaver. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Perryton, Beaver, Booker, Darrouzett, Hardesty, Elmwood, Bryans Corner, Farnsworth, Boyd, Waka, and Balko. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
